summary: LookyLoo - a file upload and sharing app

existing_features.title: Remove the file type restriction on the upload page that currently limits uploads to images and videos only, allowing users to upload any file type
Update the upload page UI text and messaging to reflect that any file type can be uploaded, not just media files
Ensure the share page handles preview display appropriately for non-media files by showing file metadata and download button without attempting to render previews for unsupported file types

new_feature_requests.summary: Expand file upload to accept any file type, not just media files
